info.name: Al Simhara background (2) + grey (v4)
info.description: You can now have The Sims 3 Al Simhara background (2 - concept art) on forums.thesims.com. This style will also change the font to Arial, make the font a bit darker and will reduce the line spacing. Also the white background and blue font are (a little) darker (version 4).
